settings.heading: AT KIDDICARE WE SPREAD THE LOVE WITH KIDDIPOINTS
settings.text:
We love to reward our loyal customers with the Kiddipoints programe not only every time you purchase our products, but also when you sign up for Kiddipoints, like or follow us on social media and on your birthday Kiddipoints can be redeemed for further savings on our already very affordable nappies and wipes.

It's super easy to get started - all you need is an account here on Kiddicare. If you've made a purchase with us before you probably already have one, and probably already have some Kiddipoints as well!

settings.discript: You will receive 500 Kiddipoints simply for signing up!
For every $1 spent (rounded up to the nearest dollar), you will recieve 10 Kiddipoints.
You will get a gift of 1000 Kiddipoints on your birthday, but you will need to make sure you let us know when your birthday is at least 30 days before you can receive this gift.
You will recieve 500 Kiddipoints simply for signing up!

settings.title: Like us on Facebook or follow us on Instagram:

settings.discript: Give us a like or follow us and we will give you 250 Kiddipoints – easy! If you've already liked us on Facebook/followed us on Instagram, don't worry! You can still get the points by clicking on those two buttons again.

settings.methodpoint: There are a few ways to earn points...

settings.discript: Exchange 4000 Kiddipoints for a 30% off coupon for your next order
Exchange Kiddipoints for  discounts. Every 100 points can be exchanged for $1 off on your next purchase.

settings.methodpoint: There are currently two ways to redeem points -

settings.title: How to earn  Kiddipoints?
settings.text:
There are a few methods to earn points.

Place an order:

For every $1 spent (rounded up to the nearest dollar), you will recieve 10 Kiddipoints.

Celebrate a birthday:

You will recieve a gift of 1000 Kiddipoints. Your birthday needs to be entered for at least 30 days before you can recieve this gift.

Sign up:

You will recieve 500 Kiddipoints simply for signing up!

Like us on Facebook/Follow us on Instagram:

If you've already liked us on Facebook/followed us on Instagram, don't worry! You can still get the points by clicking on those two buttons.

settings.title: How to Redeem Kiddipoints?
settings.text:
There are currently two ways to redeem points.

30% off coupon:

Exchange 4000 Kiddipoints for a 30% off coupon

Order discount:

Exchange Kiddipoints for a discount. Every 100 points can be exchanged for $1.

settings.dscrit: Sign up for a subscription and save with a 30% discount and receive a  super cute free Kiddicare Critter toy for every new milestone your baby achieves.

settings.title: Kiddicare critters
settings.text:
At Kiddicare, we see the milestones of growth in your newborn as a significant accomplishment, and we believe that your little critter should be rewarded with one of ours!


Sign up for our subscription program and receive a free Kiddicare Critter for every new milestone your baby achieves.

settings.heading: KIDDICARE CRITTERS
settings.text:
At Kiddicare, we see the milestones of growth in your baby as a significant accomplishment and something to be celebrated, so every time your baby progresses to the next nappy size we will send you one of our super cure Kiddicare critters!
Sign up for our subscription program and receive a free Kiddicare Critter for every new milestone your baby achieves.

settings.heading: Kiddicare critters
settings.text: We’ve been working hard with some of the best in the business to perfetct the design of our nappies, inside and out. New Zealand’s leading designers created our stunning packaging, which features the irresistibly cute Kiddicare family of animals. Many hours went into developing the perfect cuddly characters, who were lovingly handmade by a very talented New Zealand toymaker. Kiddicare nappies and wipes now bring a smile to babies and parents alike!
